dcterms:description: The BraTS challenge dataset is used for evaluating anomaly detection performance on the surrogate task of brain tumor segmentation, comprising various MRI modalities for each patient from multiple institutions.
dcterms:title: BraTS challenge dataset: Brain MRI

dcterms:creator: K. Wilde
L. Anderson
M. Boyle
A. Pinder
A. Weir
dcterms:description: The iCAIRD GG&C NHS dataset comprises head CT scans sourced from hospitals in the Greater Glasgow & Clyde area, focusing on patients diagnosed with stroke between 2013 and 2018.
dcterms:title: iCAIRD GG&C NHS dataset: Head CT

dcterms:creator: S. Chilamkurthy

P. Warier
dcterms:description: The CQ500 dataset from qure.ai is used for qualitative evaluation of head CT methods, containing various pathologies such as hemorrhages and ischemia.
dcterms:title: CQ500 dataset from qure.ai: Head CT
